com.baristamatic.inventory
Interface Inventory

All Known Implementing Classes:
SingleBaristaInventory
public interface Inventory

This interface provides access to a distinct single inventory and operations for the Baristamatic Simulator application.

Version:
1.0, 9/4/2011
Author:
Tom Stewart 
seasonedgeek@mac.com

Method Summary
 void consumeResources(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> recipe)
          Reduces resources in the inventory by the number of units found in the recipe of a featured drink.

isBaristaDrinkAvailable

boolean isBaristaDrinkAvailable(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> recipe)
Returns the state of whether or not there are sufficient ingredients 
"on hand"}, on the inventory for drink preparation.





Parameters:
recipe - 

Returns:
boolean  The drink is in-stock (true), or
                  out-of-stock (false).

priceInventory

Generates a price list for component ingredients.

stockInventory

void stockInventory()
Replenishes the inventory of component ingredients. The default amount for all ingredients is ten (10).
